7  |  2022 Awards and Recognitions• Selected as a 2022 Northwest Arkansas Business Journal  
 C-Suite Award winner 
 
 
 Selected as a 2022 Women in Supply Chain award winner  
 by Supply & Demand Chain Executive
2022 Awards and Recognitions
• Honored as an inductee to the Arkansas Business Hall of  
 Fame class of 2023 
 Named the 2022 Arkansas Business Executive of the   
 Year by Arkansas Business
 
• Selected by Arkansas Business as one of Arkansas’ 250  
 Most Influential Leaders 
• Recognized on Forbes 50 Over 50 list 
 
• Recognized by Gartner, Inc. as a CEO Talent Champion   
 during the Gartner® ReimagineHR Conference in Orlando,  
 Florida, in October 2022*  
  
 Named to Arkansas Money & Politics 2022 C-Suite 
   Named to the 2022 Forty under 40 class by the Northwest  
 Arkansas Business Journal
Individual Awards 
Judy R. McReynolds
ArcBest Chairman, President and CEOMichael Newcity
Chief Innovation Officer of ArcBest and 
President of ArcBest Technologies
Erica Brigance
Vice President of Data ScienceChristopher Adkins
Vice President of Yield Strategy and Analytics
*GARTNER is a registered trademark and service mark of Gartner, Inc. and/or its affiliates in the U.S. and internationally and is used herein with permission. All rights reserved. The CEO Talent Champion recognition does not constitute an endorsement by Gartner of the 
organization or its offerings. The CEO Talent Champion initiative is a recognition determined by an objective and transparent selection methodology. No organization or CEO, including past or present clients and vendors, is accorded preferential treatment in this process; 
participation in interviews is not a prerequisite for recognition and Gartner does not accept or review nominations.
